changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `vika_audit_system` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `user_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '用户ID(关联#vika_user#id)', `action` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '用户行为', `info` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '行为具体信息', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, KEY `IX_User_id` (`user_id`) USING BTREE, KEY `IX_Action` (`action`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='系统行为审计表';
